message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I take $6,000 and you take $4,000. A fair deal for both of us in the first round.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the money's value will drop if we keep negotiating.
Bob, let's be realistic.  I'm offering you $4,800 which is more than you would have gotten last round.  This is a good deal for both of us before inflation eats away at the value even more.
We've already lost a lot to inflation. I think this is a fair split, considering the circumstances.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it evenly and get out of here.  Any more rounds and inflation will make this whole thing a joke!
